title: MEGA Voice Pack 624 Efforts and Phrases
description: 624 Efforts and Phrases in 5 Seperate Voices! For Any Game in HQ Mono .wav 44.1khz Studio Quality .wav that are unique phrases and efforts of a Wizard for FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games, Mobile Games!
longDescription:
Visual/Audio Demo:

LISTEN TO PACK HERE


Documentation

Warrior Phrases

Knight Phrases

Wizard Phrases

Villain Phrases

Rogue Phrases


This pack includes 624 High Quality Voice Over Efforts & Phrases, recorded and mastered on Studio Equipment by a professional Voice Actor and covers everything you need for your next project in 5 separate and unique voices. This pack is a starter pack for the upcoming Phrases Pack Coming in the near future!


The voice suites any character you might need such as:

  • Wizard Character
  • Mage Character
  • Old Character
  • Warlock Character
  • Knight Character
  • Assassin Character
  • Archer Character
  • Rogue Character
  • Villain Character
  • Evil Character
  • Rough Character
  • Anti Hero
  • Warlock Character
  • Magician Character
  • Shaman Character
  • Viking Character
  • Warrior Character
  • Brute Character
  • Barbarian Character


This pack is great for genres such as:

  • FPS
  • MOBA
  • RPG
  • Action Adventure
  • Survival
  • Horror
  • Shooter
  • RTS
  • Sandbox games
  • Side Scrollers
  • Retro Games
  • Animation
  • Videos
  • And the list goes on!


All efforts and phrases included in this pack are unique and completely royalty-free that have been mixed and mastered to studio level quality.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 624 HQ Mono .wav files of good selection of common efforts and phrases for any game
  • Professional Male Voice Actor
  • This pack is divided into the effort/phrases type folders to locate the files easily
  • Top of the line studio quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality .WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.



TECHNICAL DETAILS:

  • Number of Audio tracks: 624
  • Number of Audio Cues: 624
  • Sample rate: 44.1knz 24bit 1058 kbps MONO
  • Does audio loop: YES
  • Minutes of audio provided: 15:59 min
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Supported Target Build Platforms: All


Music in preview is NOT included in this pack. It’s used for watermark purposes only.
